projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: The site you're currently viewing—yes, it's all very meta—a showcase of my projects and skills.

projects.title: Boat Bounce Game
projects.description: A 2D rogue-like platformer game where you unlock new abilities to navigate through randomly ordered levels, built in Unity.

projects.title: uCalcX
projects.description: A Python library for handling units of measurement and performing conversions across various physical quantities.

projects.title: CFG Calculator
projects.description: A calculator implementing a context-free grammar for evaluating expressions.

projects.title: Connections JS
projects.description: An implementation of the popular New York Times game, Connections, using JavaScript.

projects.title: Lights Out
projects.description: A JavaScript implementation of the game Lights Out.

projects.title: Terminal Invaders
projects.description: Space Invaders made in C++ using NCurses.

projects.title: Key Logpy
projects.description: A Python program that logs keystrokes on the machine to a specified log file.
